name: Mtime-spider
body:
### Mtime-Spider.
时光网热门电影爬虫

**测试项目**

### 功能
从[时光热度榜](http://www.mtime.com/host/)爬下电影信息，下载电影相关图片

### 使用工具
- python3.4
- scrapy
- beautifulsoap

### Authors and Contributors
SYN(@rocknio)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
